snippet: They, in turn, stated they wanted to eventually see Navalny as a member of the party. On 15 December 2012 Navalny expressed his support of the party, saying, "The People's Alliance is my party", but again refused to join it, citing the criminal cases against him.

title: The political opposition in Russia - European Parliament
snippet: Born 4 June 1976 in Butyn (Odintsovsky District, Moscow Oblast, Russia). Political affiliation: Yabloko (2000–2007), Progress Party/Russia of the Future (since 2013). Alexei Navalny is a Russian politician, lawyer, founder of the Anti-Corruption Foundation and

title: True Beliefs and Opportunism: Navalny’s Tangled Political Development - The Moscow Times
snippet: In 1999, Navalny made his first foray into formal politics, joining the center-left pro-European liberal party, Yabloko.
